items.name: General Tso's Delight
items.description: Hot and spicy. Jumbo shrimp and tender chunks of chicken batter dipped and fried golden brown in the general's famous sweet and spicy sauce served with a side of broccoli.

items.name: Beef with Orange Flavor
items.description: Hot and spicy. Tender chunks of beef batter dipped and fried golden brown, then tossed into a tangy brown sauce garnished with orange zest and served with a side of broccoli.

items.name: Chicken with Orange Flavor
items.description: Hot and spicy. Chunks of chicken batter dipped and fried golden brown, then tossed into a tangy brown sauce garnished with orange zest and served with a side of broccoli.

items.name: Sesame Chicken
items.description: Tender chunks of chicken batter dipped and fried golden brown, then tossed into a sweet brown sauce sprinkled with toasted sesame seeds and served with a side of broccoli.

items.name: Sesame Beef
items.description: Tender chunks of beef batter dipped and fried golden brown, then tossed into a sweet brown sauce sprinkled with toasted sesame seeds and served with a side of broccoli.

items.name: Sesame Shrimp
items.description: Jumbo shrimp batter dipped and fried golden brown, then tossed into a sweet brown sauce sprinkled with toasted sesame seeds and served with a side of broccoli.

items.name: Sesame Pineapple Chicken
items.description: Tender chunks of chicken batter dipped and fried golden brown, then tossed into a sweet pineapple sauce garnished with chunks of pineapple and toasted sesame seeds and served with a side of broccoli.

items.name: Lake Tung Ting Shrimp
items.description: Jumbo shrimp with assorted vegetables sauteed in a delicate egg white sauce.

items.name: Butterfly Shrimp with Bacon
items.description: Jumbo shrimp batter fried and wrapped in bacon and cooked in an omelette and served on a bed of onions with a light tomato sauce.

items.name: Mongolian Beef
items.description: Hot and spicy. Slices of tender beef sauteed with onions and scallions in Mongolian sauce with a hint of mustard.

items.name: Wor Bar
items.description: Hot and spicy. Jumbo shrimp and sliced chicken over a bed of mushroom sand onions in a hot pepper sauce garnished with homemade rice crisps.

items.name: Hot and Spicy Szechuan Beef
items.description: Hot and spicy. Tender pieces of beef sauteed with julienned vegetables in a spicy brown sauce.

items.name: East Meet West Savory Pork
items.description: Hot and spicy. Tender slices of pork sauteed twice in house special Szechuan sauce with cabbage.

items.name: Roast Pork and Chicken with Mixed Vegetables
items.description: Tender slices of roast pork and chicken sauteed with assorted  vegetables in house brown sauce.

items.name: General Tso's Tofu
items.description: Hot and spicy. Chunks of tofu fried golden brown in the general's famous sweet and spicy sauce served with a side of broccoli.

items.name: Sesame Tofu
items.description: Chunks of tofu fried golden brown, tossed into a sweet brown sauce sprinkled with toasted sesame seeds and served with a side of broccoli.

items.name: Lotus Delight
items.description: Jumbo shrimp, chicken and beef with mixed vegetables in che's delicate egg white sauce.

items.name: Coconut Mango Chicken
items.description: Tender chunks of chicken breast batter dipped and fried golden brown in our delicious brown sauce tossed with fresh mango slices and sprinkled with fresh coconut. Served with side of steamed broccoli. Seasonal.

items.name: Happy Family
items.description: Jumbo shrimp, chicken, beef, scallops, roast pork and lobster meat with assorted vegetables served in a house brown sauce.

items.name: Triple Delight
items.description: Jumbo shrimp, beef and chicken with assorted vegetables served in house brown sauce.

items.name: Seafood Combination
items.description: Jumbo shrimp, scallops and lobster meat with mixed vegetables in smooth white sauce.

items.name: Szechuan Double Taste
items.description: Jumbo shrimp and chicken with mixed vegetables in spicy brown sauce.

items.name: House Eggplant
items.description: Chinese eggplant sauteed with shrimp, chicken and pork in garlic sauce.

items.name: East Meets West Jumbo Shrimp
items.description: Deep fried jumbo shrimp with mixed vegetables in house brown sauce.

items.name: Hunan Chicken Home Style
items.description: Sliced chicken sauteed with shredded ginger and string beans in delicate brown sauce.

items.name: Black Pepper Chicken
items.description: Sliced chicken with fresh ground pepper, baby corn and mushrooms in black pepper sauce.

items.name: Dragon Meets Phoenix
items.description: Tender chunks of lobster meat, sliced chicken, red and green peppers, baby corn and black mushrooms in house brown sauce.

items.name: Pineapple Chicken
items.description: Tender chunks of chicken batter dipped and fried golden brown drizzled with sweet pineapple sauce with a side of broccoli.

items.name: Shrimp and Scallops in Garlic Sauce
items.description: Jumbo shrimp and scallops sauteed with assorted julienned vegetables in our delicious garlic sauce.

items.name: Winery Jumbo Shrimp
items.description: Jumbo shrimp with assorted vegetables sauteed in our delicious white wine sauce.

items.name: Shrimp and Scallops in Lobster Sauce
items.description: Jumbo shrimp and scallops sauteed in our tasty egg based lobster sauce garnished with green peas.

items.name: Walnut Shrimp
items.description: Jumbo shrimp batter dipped and fried golden brown and tossed into brown sauce and sprinkled with toasted walnuts.

items.name: Shredded Chicken and Beef
items.description: Tender strips of chicken and beef sauteed with bell peppers and onions in ginger scallion sauce.

items.name: Shrimp and Chicken Cashew
items.description: Jumbo shrimp and chicken with mixed vegetables sauteed in brown sauce garnished with roasted cashew nuts.

items.name: Jumbo Shrimp and Chicken Combination
items.description: Jumbo shrimp and sliced chicken sauteed with mixed vegetables in our delicious brown sauce.

items.name: General Tso's Chicken
items.description: Tender chunks of chicken batter dipped and fried golden brown in the general's famous sweet and spicy sauce served with a side of broccoli.

items.description: Hot and spicy. Jumbo shrimp batter dipped and fried golden brown in the general's famous sweet and spicy sauce served with a side of broccoli.
